name: Dr. Sarah Chen
content: Yashraj's analytical skills and attention to detail are exceptional. His work on the healthcare readmission prediction model directly contributed to improving patient outcomes.

name: Michael Rodriguez
content: Working with Yashraj was a pleasure. His ability to translate complex data insights into actionable business recommendations is outstanding.

name: Prof. David Kim
content: Yashraj demonstrates strong technical skills and a deep understanding of machine learning concepts. His projects show both theoretical knowledge and practical application.
